comments_inline.body: Again this is a bug in canopy and not in Flask.

Again it is a bug in Python,  http://bugs.python.org/issue20140#
it has not been closed.

Closing this.  While this is not a flask issue directly, there are known issues with unicode filenames in Flask as well that would require someone to provide good patches to.  For the moment, just don't use non ascii filenames.
